a5: The World Cup is not just for human beings, join APE's World Cup together and get unprecedented
a8: This year is 2022, the year of the World Cup. The world Cup APE is a collection of World Cup-themed NFTs, including 1,000 football players. Each NFT is composed of many elements. There are differences in appearance and rarity. Therefore, each NFT is unique, and Unable to copy.
a9: These simian players are built for fans to become owners on the blockchain, as they also experience priceless athlete engagement experiences that together create the future of football culture. Hats off to everyone who loves football and those players!
a10: Holding the World Cup APE NFT will not only be a collectible, but also a membership certificate. In the future, we will connect various fields such as the Metaverse, sports, and entertainment. Continue to expand the possibility and value attributes of holding World Cup APE NFTs.
a11: In a world of apes, every ape lives a simple life, playing and having fun all day long.
a12: Until one day, football appeared, they quickly fell in love with this sport, and it became a habit of the entire ethnic group, which has gradually followed to this day. Today, they have integrated football into their lives, and almost every ape loves football, especially those football players, who have become the idols of all apes.
a13: The soccer tournament in the monkey world, the World Cup, has become the highest honor. They are crazy about the World Cup, they are raving about it, and they expect these players to bring them thrilling football matches on the green field.
